articles.author: PTI
articles.title: ‘Designate Hamas as terrorist outfit in India’, Israeli envoy says ‘it’s time' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Israeli ambassador said many countries including the US, Canada and the European Union have already designated Hamas as a terror outfit. | Latest News India
articles.content:
Israel on Wednesday asked India to designate Hamas as a terrorist entity like many other countries have done even as it hailed New Delhi's "solid support" to its operations against the outfit.
